```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  
"eCampus" = c(checked,
              unchecked),

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
                 unchecked),

"Qualtrics" = c(unchecked,
                checked),

Description = c("Submit a course task: Pilot Study Ledger",
                "Watch short walkthroughs on some of the functionalities of Qualtrics that are either needed, may help to raise your response rates or both."),

Location = c("[Link](/assignment/07-assignment/#pilot-study-ledger-1)",
             "[Link](/example/07-example/#qualtrics-functionalities)")

)

```
